--- select_dot_star_except.sql
SELECT T.* EXCEPT (vegetable) FROM (SELECT "apple" AS fruit, "carrot" AS vegetable) AS T
--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.DotStar{
        Star: 9,
        Expr: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 7,
          NameEnd: 8,
          Name:    "T",
        },
        Except: &ast.SelectExcept{
          Except:  11,
          Rparen:  28,
          Columns: []*ast.Ident{
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 19,
              NameEnd: 28,
              Name:    "vegetable",
            },
          },
        },
        Replace: (*ast.SelectReplace)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   30,
      Source: &ast.SubQueryTableExpr{
        Lparen: 35,
        Rparen: 82,
        Query:  &ast.Select{
          Select:   36,
          Distinct: false,
          As:       nil,
          Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
            &ast.Alias{
              Expr: &ast.StringLiteral{
                ValuePos: 43,
                ValueEnd: 50,
                Value:    "apple",
              },
              As: &ast.AsAlias{
                As:    51,
                Alias: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 54,
                  NameEnd: 59,
                  Name:    "fruit",
                },
              },
            },
            &ast.Alias{
              Expr: &ast.StringLiteral{
                ValuePos: 61,
                ValueEnd: 69,
                Value:    "carrot",
              },
              As: &ast.AsAlias{
                As:    70,
                Alias: &ast.Ident{
                  NamePos: 73,
                  NameEnd: 82,
                  Name:    "vegetable",
                },
              },
            },
          },
          From:    (*ast.From)(nil),
          Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
          GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
          Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
          OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
          Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    84,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 87,
            NameEnd: 88,
            Name:    "T",
          },
        },
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT T.* EXCEPT (vegetable) FROM (SELECT "apple" AS fruit, "carrot" AS vegetable) AS T
